Package gameai.views

Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameai.views.MainWindow
  • public class MainWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    After the user logs in the gets send to the mainwindow, this is the class that is used to create that window. This is also the class that hold all the other views.
